title: Human and animal beginnings
creator_credit: Wexler Film Productions and Curtis Avery
brief_description: Presents basic information about human reproduction and concepts of the family. Includes baby monkeys and mice, newborn guinea pigs and rabbits, with time-lapse photography of a hatching chicken egg and fish eggs. Animated sequences showing prebirth growth and development, and birth itself. Also shows scenes of babies in the hospital nursery home.
